Description:
COASTAL FAMILY LIVING HAS NEVER LOOKED SO GOOD
This exceptional family home in the popular Surf View Estate offers an outstanding living environment and will appeal to those who demand quality, position and lifestyle. Bursting with natural light, this property is only seconds from primary schools, parks and is highlighted by sophisticated living with spacious interiors, superb entertaining zones and quality finishes throughout.
Designed with a chefs touch in mind, the deluxe kitchen includes a huge stone island benchtop, soft close cabinetry throughout, stainless steel appliances, dishwasher and walk in pantry that will not disappoint. All of this is adjoined by the meals and family room complete with gas log fire and bi fold doors that lead to the outdoor entertaining area. Also on this level is an informal lounge, powder room and laundry with great storage plus stone benchtops.
Upstairs comprises of a great sized master bedroom which includes walk in robe and ensuite with floor to ceiling tiles, dual vanity and stone benchtops. The other three bedrooms all have built in robes with two of the bedrooms having ocean views. Add to this a third living area, central main bathroom again with floor to ceiling tiles and stone bench top and separate toilet.
Features include internal access to remote controlled double garage, extensive decking both at the front and back of house, ducted heating and cooling throughout, alarm system, dual blinds, plenty of storage and low maintenance landscaped gardens.
This home is perfect for any growing family that is looking for a quality home in a great location.
Insights: 29 Sea Breeze Drive, Torquay VIC 3228 was last sold in 2013 and 139 other 4 bedroom house in Torquay have recently been sold.

Description:
Low Maintenance Living a Walk to the Village!
Ideally positioned an easy 500 metre stroll to the vibrant Highton Village, equidistant to both High St and Waurn Ponds Shopping Centres, access to public transport and local schools make this location all about convenience!
Boasting an elevated north facing aspect this immaculate 2br unit provides the owner with a delightful outlook. The property is surrounded by picturesque gardens and includes a sheltered area the perfect spot to relax and enjoy a coffee or glass of wine!
Upon entry through french doors you are greeted with a light filled and functional open plan living space which incorporates an updated kitchen and adj meals area featuring stunning timber floorboards throughout this area. The 2brs are spacious with BIRS and serviced by a modern central bathroom and European laundry.
The unit has year round comfort with S/S A/C. A large garage completes this value packed unit the perfect addition to your investment portfolio or 1st home buyer or downsizer looking to purchase in on of Geelong's most sought after suburbs.
Insights: 1/42 Sanglen Terrace, Belmont VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 23 other 2 bedroom unit in Belmont have recently been sold.

Description:
Price + Position = The Perfect Property!
Set upon approx. 595m2, this property presents buyers with infinite possibilities! Offering a rare combination of a sought after location in a quiet street, within close proximity to leafy Highton Village and all the luxuries on High Street. Comprising of 2 bedrooms, master with the addition of an ensuite, while the central bathroom is big and bright. The lounge room has the flexibility to become the 3rd bedroom if required. The kitchen/meals and living area enjoy delightful views of the beautiful gardens and there are French doors leading out to the front deck. The kitchen is well equipped with oven, gas stove and dishwasher plus plenty of cupboard space. Outback you will find a lovely decked alfresco area which overlooks the low-maintenance gardens, water tank and a further undercover area, perfect for entertaining guests. Extras include floorboards, ducted heating, split system A/C, 8 Solar panels, a semi enclosed double carport with remote door and a single garage/shed. This charming home is ideal for a couple, small family or investor and presents perfectly mixed original details with fantastic updates.
Insights: 4 Cambridge Street, Belmont VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 182 other 3 bedroom house in Belmont have recently been sold.

Description:
Renovated and Ready to Go with Plentiful Storage Options!
Whether you're looking to break into the Grovedale market, or you need extra space to accommodate the family or a home business, this impressive residence will more than meet your needs. Perched on a 680m2 block and recently renovated, the home resides in a convenient Grovedale pocket, renowned for its abundance of parks and reputable schools. Offering exceptional value for money, this brick and tile abode is ideal for first home buyers, investors and young families seeking a quality home.
Tucked away behind a private fence, there's more than meets the eye to this low-set home which appreciates a prized, north-facing aspect. Stepping inside, an open plan layout is revealed showcasing a spacious lounge and dining room fitted with a split system heating and cooling unit for climate control all year round. The living areas integrate seamlessly with the near-new kitchen enhanced with striking subway tiles, gas cooking and a huge corner pantry.
Accommodation comprises 3 bedrooms (the master with air-conditioning), all of which include built-in robes. Servicing the bedrooms is a renovated bathroom with shower, bath, and a separate toilet.
Outside, a sunny timber deck beckons, the perfect spot for a casual barbeque with friends while the kids kick the footy in the large and level backyard. Featuring a double garage/workshop and an adjoining double carport, there's oodles of room to store all the toys including cars, boats, trailers and camping gear. The attached rumpus is a bonus find and is a versatile space which could be used as a games room, teenagers retreat or a base for your home office, business or salon.
Only a 5-minute drive to Waurn Ponds Plaza and within proximity to Deakin University, Epworth Hospital and the Leisurelink Aquatic Centre, it's no wonder Grovedale is popular with families who relish in the wide range of amenities available nearby. The easy accessibility to the Geelong Ring Road makes it a breeze to commute to Melbourne for work or head out to the coast on weekends. With all the big-ticket items recently updated, there's nothing left to do but move in and relax.
http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
The perfect downsizer, first home or investment opportunity
Brilliantly positioned and perfectly presented this outstanding property is located in ever popular Grovedale and is set in a quiet secluded court surrounded by beautiful homes. This fantastic home has much to offer including a very generous open plan living / dining room and fantastic kitchen that is filled with beautiful north facing light. The two generous bedrooms are serviced by a central bathroom complete with spa and a generous backyard and separate court yard complete the package. Located on the doorstep of Waurn Ponds shopping centre offering convenience to supermarkets, restaurants, medical, retail, schools and much more. This outstanding property will suit the downsizer, young couple or astute investor looking for property in the very best location offering up life of ease.
- Single lock up garage with internal access
- Heating and cooling
- Large light filled living zone
- Both back yard and separate court yard
- Loads of curb side appeal
- Ideally located to Waurn Ponds shopping centre

Description:
Downsize without compromise!
So youre thinking of downsizing but dont want to live in a shoebox and still want room for a visitor to come and stay? Look no further than this beautiful spacious 2 bedroom unit!
Youll love that its super low-maintenance, has a garage for your pride and joy and most of all perhaps - the proportions that make it feel more like a house than a unit!
Not just perfect for downsizers, great for first home owners too that like to entertain but cant be bothered tending to a huge yard. A neat little study helps you work from home, and your own private driveway accommodates several cars for when your friends come to stay (in good time!).
Timber floors and plenty of natural light combine to create that warm homely feeling, while central heating and a split system help in the more literal sense.
Be quick this one is sure to be popular!

Did you say a 23 meter frontage??
Set in one of the most affluential locales of Geelong, 6 Balleroy Road Highton welcomes you with open arms. Offering a huge 23m frontage, the home you have always dreamt of is now a possibility. Whether your design includes a 3-car garage, additional garaging for your boat or caravan, the options are endless.
A northern aspect along with its convenient location, close to nearby shopping, public transport and schooling, make this allotment highly desirable and an opportunity that should not be missed. This 724m2 (approx.) parcel is titled and ready to build on. So what are you waiting for? Turn your dream into a reality, call today!

Description:
Light, bright and easy to adore
Youll love:
This quality build features a stylish blend of modern finishes and fixtures. The well-balanced single-story layout and clever storage make living here a breeze.
The home features polished concrete flooring, chrome fixtures, square set plaster, 2.7m raised ceilings and beautiful cabinetry throughout.
Ducted heating and split system will keep you cosy and cool year-round.
The light-filled kitchen features stone benchtop, Smeg appliances, copper pendant lights and a butlers pantry.
Plus:
Three large bedrooms, two with BIRs. The serene master bedroom features a timber ceiling fan, WIR and ensuite with double vanity and double shower (one of which is a Monsoon).
The north-facing open-plan living area is basked in natural light year-round and opens to a large deck and covered alfresco and beautifully manicured low maintenance gardens and lawn, making indoor-outdoor flow effortless.
A clever study nook offers a separate zone to work, study or be inspired.
The 1.5 car lock-up garage features generous storage and offers a rear sliding door, giving access to the backyard.
This peaceful home is nestled in a lovely neighbourhood and is walking distance to schools, The Sands golf club, Whites Beach and a few minutes drive to the Torquay North shopping centre.

Description:
Modern Design, Low Maintenance Living
Walking distance to the beach and a short drive to Torquays town centre this property is located in the perfect location.
With a harmonious balance of low maintenance Surf Coast living this particularly impressive home boasts, modern design and a superbly functional layout. With two levels of living the home offers generously proportioned living areas and an enviable lifestyle perfect for the growing family. Manicured drought tolerant gardens and fabulous outdoor areas at the front and rear provide the perfect backdrop for successful entertaining.
Add to this, three generous bedrooms all with walk in robes, main with ensuite and balcony, modern well appointed kitchen with quality appliances adjoins the dining area that flows to a separate living area plus another separate formal lounge study with custom built in desk, making the space perfect for working from home.
Other features include
Polished concrete floors
Ducted heating
6.4kw solar power system
2.5 bathrooms
Note: Photo id with current address must be provided at all open for inspections due to Covid 19 restrictions.
Ceiling fans in all bedrooms
Reverse cycle A/C
Dishwasher washer
Security system including remote access CCTV
Spacious double remote garage with drive thru and internal access.
Remote controlled irrigation system to gardens
Walking distance to sands golf course and schools
Tightly held Cul de Sac

Description:
Lot 460 - Stage 13A The Dunes - TITLED
448m2 block located on Poa Street in Stage 13 The Dunes, Torquay.
NBN and utility connections ready - Titled, ready to build now!
Schools, shops & sporting facilities all within arms reach.
5% deposit required at signing of contracts within 7 days of acceptance.
Contracts are ready to sign and deposit is due at confirmation of lot purchase.
*While every effort is made to deliver titles and lots at the expected timeframes, there are several factors out of the control of the developer, civil contractor and agent that can cause the release of land to sometimes be delayed or earlier than quoted. We will endeavor to keep buyers updated during construction of expected timeframes for titles and settlement. We suggest that buyers take this into account when purchasing.

Description:
Low Maintenance Chic Living in Unrivalled Location!!
This classically chic unit is located in one of the best positions you could possibly buy in - a leafy pocket just walking distance to the sought after Highton village and minutes to the river precinct.
Beautifully presented and refreshed, this property epitomises low maintenance and easy living and makes the perfect first home, downsizer option or ideal rental property.
Airey and bright Inside with north facing light drenching the lounge area, the internal colour palate is modern yet neutral appealing to all buyer. Functional kitchen offer plenty of cupboard space and adjoins the dining area . Two excellent sized bedrooms each with robes and is serviced by the neat bathroom. Outdoors is highlighted by ample single carport and private courtyard for alfresco entertaining. Features: gas wall heater, split system A/C. Nothing to spend, simply put the feet up and enjoy or rent out and reap the rewards.
Affordable value buying with location and positioning simply unmatched!
Insights: 2/32 Elsvern Avenue, Belmont VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 23 other 2 bedroom unit in Belmont have recently been sold.

Description:
"Camelia Way" A Grovedale Oasis
If you are searching for a sizable family home in a lovely quiet street then this well loved residence is a must to inspect.
Originally it was a 4 bedroom home with 1 living area, however it has been extended to make a huge extra living area and the 4th is now a study (easily able to be converted back to a bedroom). Some of its many features include:
- large single garage with pit
-split system air conditioning and heating with solar power setup
-lovely nth aspect from lounge plus a huge 4.5m x 8m extra living room
-beautiful garden complete with multiple zones including vegie patch, Camellias, fruit trees and a "secret garden"
-separate shower room and bathroom with new tiling
-large street frontage with ample side parking for boat, caravan or trailer
-fantastic sheltered "El-fresco" outdoor covered BBQ area perfect for entertaining and outdoor living
This lovely home suits a multitude of buyers so phone now to arrange a 1 on 1 appointment or an on-line video inspection.

Description:
Solid Home! Solid Investment!
Extremely well located in a sought-after pocket of Grovedale. Just walking distance to Heyers Road shopping strip, schools and public transport.
This well presented and maintained property makes the perfect first home or an ideal investment for the savvy investor.
From the generously sized formal living space we are lead through to the Kitchen/meals area. The kitchen is functional with gas burner cooktop, wall oven, lots of cupboards and bench space plus pantry. The storage in the home is plentiful with a large cupboard located along the hallway. Which leads straight to the 3 large bedrooms. The central bathroom with shower, bath and vanity along with a separate toilet.
Featuring a double carport with access through to the rear yard on both sides of the home plus low maintenance yard. This original home will pleasantly surprise upon inspection packed with potential. Other features include timber floors, family sized laundry, heating and cooling and ceiling fans.
This home presents an exciting opportunity for either 1st home or it is ideal for the savvy investor as it is currently tenanted out with the lease expiring 04/21 for $330pw! In an absolutely prime location with everything on your doorstep! This property truly ticks all the boxes! Inspection is a must!
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
True Family Home
Beautifully presented and set on a generous allotment of approx. 785 sqm this is a home that ticks all the boxes. Well proportioned, the home offers three spacious living areas, four bedrooms, a newly renovated ensuite, together with a stylish kitchen complete with stone benchtops. Outside there is a large undercover entertaining area with access from the double carport to the double garage and another undercover storage area as well. Surrounded by parks, schools and with excellent access to the Ring Road and the Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre the position here is ideal. Inspection here is a must.

Address: 1 Rip View Close Jan Juc VIC 3228
Description:
SWEEPING OCEAN VIEWS IN A PRESTIGIOUS LOCATION
Privately set in one of the Surf Coasts most esteemed locations is this SK Dunstan quality-built residence, with a trademark standard set and positioned on 6802m2 (approx.) of land commanding sweeping ocean and foreshore views, you will not want for more.
Built over multiple floors with the entry level consisting of an open plan living and dining area with vaulted ceilings above a very well-appointed kitchen that features include: stone benchtops, timber cabinetry, pantry, double sink, dishwasher and electric appliances. A separate laundry with direct access to the exceptionally large garage with workshop and storage complete the internal makeup on this level, with the added bonus of an extensive deck, with more panoramic views of the ocean and complimented by a native themed backdrop.
The master bedroom with a fully renovated en-suite & WIR takes up the first floor together with the study which includes built in desk and drawers. Another extension of this magnificent home is the north wing with a further 3 bedrooms all with BIRs, renovated family bathroom and separate toilet. The lower level comprises a large rumpus room with built-in bar, floor heating and separate powder room.
This property also showcases, a full-sized tennis court, beautifully landscaped grounds, solar heated 9m x 4.5m in ground pool, with the entertainer at heart getting full appreciation of the sheltered ground floor deck, open fire place and fenced hot tub with electric heating.
Other highlights of this residence include, Tasmanian brush box flooring, ducted vacuum, panel heating, ceiling fans, surround sound system, air conditioning, 2.7m ceilings, a 40,000 Litre tank plus access to town water, a wastewater recycle system and plenty of storage throughout the home.
Dont miss out on this exceptional property in a highly sort after location, call today to book your private inspection!

Description:
Your Own Private Oasis
This tranquil resort home with 3 bedrooms and 1 bathroom would suit anyone, young or old with convenience store and gym across the road, bus stops out the front and Fishermans beach just 800m away. In the evening the sensational outdoor area lights up for everyone to enjoy the serine beauty that leads directly from the open plan living area. This is a very low maintenance home, no lawns to mow, beautiful wall art and palms along the fence lines. Features include gas log fire, air-conditioning, sauna, spa and solar panels. For shopping or enjoying a meal out there is Torquay North to the right and Torquay Central to the left both only a stroll away.
This is an outstanding property and will not last long on the market..Spoil yourself, theres nothing to do except move in, sit back and enjoy the pristine beaches of Torquay and surrounds, a luxurious relaxed new life is waiting for you.
Note: Photo id with current address must be provided at all open for inspections due to Covid 19 restrictions.

Description:
LIFESTYLE, VIEWS & LOCATION!!!
Located in the sought-after Sands Estate this magnificent residence will suit a range of buyers from all demographics with its flexible floor plan, clever design and use of natural light throughout. Showcased over two spacious levels entry level consists of a private master bedroom with an outlook over the waterways and includes walk in robe and en-suite with twin vanity, a second living room which provides the perfect space for the family to wind down and relax for the day, an impressive theatre room with striking barn door, and the fabulous entertainers kitchen that flows perfectly with the dining and family zone and out to alfresco entertaining, full bathroom, separate powder room and laundry complete this level. A further 3 bedrooms are located on the upper level including a guest room with walk in robe and en-suite, a retreat /study area offering the perfect space for reading and relaxing and divides the guest room from bedrooms three and four which share a second family bathroom as well as having direct access. Additional features include ceiling fans and split system heating & cooling throughout, huge walk in pantry, triple lock up garage. Situated on a 551m2 allotment with landscaped gardens, this residence has been designed and built to compliment a relaxed and easy lifestyle with an emphasis on the beautiful views of the water ways and reserve. All within a short stroll to the impressive Peppers Resort and clubhouse, a few minutes to Whites beach, and a short drive to town centre. If this sounds like the lifestyle your looking for arrange your inspection today!!
Insights: 4 Loch Lomond Crescent, Torquay VIC 3228 was last sold in 2020 and 139 other 4 bedroom house in Torquay have recently been sold.

Description:
Titled Land Now Selling
The Dunes, Torquay has been designed to complement both the landscape and the laid back coastal lifestyle - while giving you state-of-the-art facilities and beautiful
scenery to build your new home.
Centrally located to let you make the most of Torquay's attractions The Dunes gives you quick and easy access to the beach and the Sands Golf Club, new shopping centres, schools, sporting facilities and just around the point leads you straight to Torquay's main beach.
Once you arrive home to The Dunes, the atmosphere, clean ocean air and open space will make it seem as if you are in a world of your own.
Insights: First listed on 25 September, this property has been on Domain for 25 days.

Description:
Convenient & secure low maintenance unit.
As solid as they come and ready for a new owner seeking maximum convenience in this peaceful location. Ideal for first home buyers and downsizers, or the savvy investor seeking massive growth. Positioned within walking distance to the Barwon River Precinct and High Street Shopping Hub, there is no better position for those seeking a convenient carefree lifestyle.
Presented to perfection and offering light filled accommodation consisting of open plan kitchen, dining and lounge room, flowing to the two spacious bedrooms with BIR's and central two way bathroom. Rounding out this sensational offering is the outdoor entertaining area which is private and enclosed with plenty of space to entertain while being surrounded by a low maintenance garden.
Features include split system, dishwasher, gas top cooking with electric oven and a single carport. Within close proximity to Geelong Ring Road taking you to Melbourne under an hour, world class Deakin University, Epworth Hospital, GMHBA Stadium, the home of the Geelong Football Club, and with the Surf Coast only 15 minutes away this central position has it all.
